page.title: 01CHARLTON-HANKERTON:SURVEY
page.content: This area,essentially farming country,contains the village of {Hankerton}and part of{Charlton village.Professional and business people now live here and commute to places in towns and cities made accessible by the M.4 London to Bristol motorway about ten miles away.Officers and other Royal Air Force personnel have homes here also. There are old houses and farms but modern houses have been built since the building of the M.4.Not included in this block but nevertheless important to village life is the {Charlton Park Estate,the seat of the {21st Earl of Suffolk and 14th Earl of {Berkshire;}Charlton Church dating from the 12th Century and nearby old cottages belonging to the Estate;the village post_office and a memorial to villagers killed in two world wars.{
